import update from"immutability-helper";//액션 타입 정의
var SET_APP_STATE="SET_APP_STATE";//액션 생성 함수
export var setAppState=function setAppState(data){return{type:SET_APP_STATE,payload:data};};//모듈의 초기 상태 정의
var initialState={appState:{}};//reducer
var reducer=function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_APP_STATE:return update(state,{appState:{$set:action.payload}});default:return state;}};export default reducer;
